input.sentences: the water by the ocean was beautiful today .
we decided to take a walk .
the water was still and relaxing .
there were lovely flowers blooming everywhere .
after | we went out to dinner with my favorite neice .
output.sentences: Oh boy look at that water that seems to be a part of an ocean and a beautiful coastal backdrop to boot!
I was out for a walk admiring the scenery when I decided to take off my shirt and pose for a photo with this stranger with cold hands.
I turned around to get a shot of the water again, how relaxing!
As I was walking back this lovely cache of flowers peacefully blooming caught me by my ear and I just had to take a snap!
Finally got back to the bodega where I met up with my neice and her favorite adopted child for a wonderful cat dinner.
